Text: Do you know Bruce Stover at AnadarkoMark I found a good looking job at Anadarko attached I believe the hiring supervisor is Bruce Stover who is the chairman of the University of Oklahoma Board of VisitorsCollege of Engineering where I went to school I think I should be able to match up with him but I dont know him and need some help in getting into his office Do you know him and here is the big favor know him well enough to get me into his office At any rate let me know what is going on with you in Denver This job hunting is like no fun at all Thanks Andy
